articles.title: Yoga based intervention can reduce opioid dependence - Department Of Science & Technology

articles.content:
Yoga which is being promoted all over the world through the observance of the International Yoga Day today, has the potential to reduce problems like Opioid Dependence.

articles.title: Credit card payments through Cred and PhonePe to be unavailable after this date - Zee Business
articles.description: Major banks like Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, and ICICI Bank, which have issued over 50 million credit cards, have yet to enable BBPS compliance. Consequently, customers will be unable to pay their credit card bills through fintech platforms like Cred and PhonePe af…
articles.content: Fintech companies such as PhonePe, Cred, BillDesk, and Infibeam Avenues are among those impacted by the latest RBI regulation requiring credit card bill payments to be routed through the RBI's centra… [+1572 chars]
